item.title: Calm Down
item.description: Calm Down # Background # You know, I think this– that song… I don’t mean to be a downer… I mean, those of you who have been following my work for years know exactly who that song is about. And what it’s about. But it’s so interesting to me that so many people love that song. And so many people say, “Oh, it’s helped me get through this,” “It’s helped calm me down,” “It’s helped do this for me.

item.title: Spring Cleaning
item.description: Spring Cleaning # Background # Fun fact! On the recorded version of this song, on Sage and Silver Bullets, um, the bassist I hired, Patrick (he’s super awesome, he also played mandolin on the record), the bassline to this is inspired by the Imperial March from Star Wars.
